naslov: Ljubač – Luksuzna vila s bazenom na zemljištu od 652 m2 + dodatni susj (prodaja)
opis: Ljubač - Ljubački Stanovi Prodaje se  luksuzna vila s bazenom i otvorenim pogledom na more. Vila od 300 m2 nalazi se na zemljištu površine 652 m2, uz što dolazi i dodatni susjedni teren od 741 m2, u mirnom okruženju. 100m udaljenost od mora i plaže! Objekt se sastoji od prizemlja te prvog i drugog kata. Prizemlje: - velika kuhinja (open space koncept) s blagovaonicom, - prostrani dnevni boravak, - kupaonica s toaletom, - praonica, - velika natkrivena terasa, - garaža. Prvi kat: - 4 spavaće sobe, - 4 kupaonice s toaletima, - 3 natkrivene prostrane terase. Drugi kat: - velika krovna terasa s jacuzzijem i pogledom na more. Moguća kupnja u trenutnoj, roh bau fazi! Sve dodatne informacije na upit. Agencijska naknada sukladno Općim uvjetima poslovanja. Cjelokupni kupoprodajni proces vođen od strane našeg ovlaštenog Odvjetničkog tima. OBILAZAK NEKRETNINE OSIGURAN 7/7 DANA PO PRETHODNOM DOGOVORU! Ljubač - Ljubački Stanovi For sale - a luxurious villa with a swimming pool and an open sea view. A villa of 300 m2 is located on a plot of land measuring 652 m2, along with an additional adjacent terrain of 741 m2, in a quiet environment.. 100m distance from the sea and beach! The building consists of the ground floor, first and second floor. Ground floor: - large kitchen (open space concept) with dining room, - spacious living room, - bathroom with a toilet, - laundry room, - large covered terrace, - garage. First floor: - 4 bedrooms, - 4 bathrooms with toilets, - 3 spacious covered terraces. Second floor: - large roof terrace with a jacuzzi and a sea view. Possible purchase in the current, roh bau phase! All additional information on request. Brokerage fee in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions. The entire purchase/sale process is managed by our authorized law office. TOUR OF THE PROPERTY INSURED 7/7 DAYS BY PREVIOUS AGREEMENT! Ljubač - Ljubački Stanovi Zum Verkauf steht eine luxuriöse Villa mit Swimmingpool und offenem Meerblick. Das Gebäude besteht aus Erdgeschoss, erstem und zweitem Obergeschoss. Erdgeschoss: - große Küche (Open-Space-Konzept) mit Esszimmer, - geräumiges Wohnzimmer, - Badezimmer mit Toilette, - Wäschekammer, - große überdachte Terrasse, - Garage. Erster Stock: - 4 Schlafzimmer, - 4 Badezimmer mit Toiletten, - 3 großzügige überdachte Terrassen. Zweiter Stock: - große Dachterrasse mit Jacuzzi und Meerblick.
